ISSUE.TITLE: Add icon support to ntfy notification provider
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### ⚠️ Please verify that this feature request has NOT been suggested before. - [X] I checked and didn't find similar feature request ### ️ Feature Request Type Other ### Feature description Add icon support to the ntfy notification provider (icon support has been added to ntfy with a release on 2022-09-27). ### ✔️ Solution There's just another parameter to have in the notification providers' settings and the http request sent. ### ❓ Alternatives none ### Additional Context _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add support for icon to ntfy notification provider (requires minimum ntfy server version 1.28.0 and Android app 1.14.0, no iOS support as of today)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [empty commit] pull request for icon support in ntfy notification provider (fixes #2135)
